Game¶

class source.game.Game(payoffs, time_horizon)[source]¶
values = None¶

tuple with a tuple for each target with the values for each player

time_horizon = None¶
players = None¶

dict of players indexed by integers

attackers = None¶

list of attackers’ indexes

defenders = None¶

list of defenders’ indexes

history = None¶

list of dict for each turn: each one is made by the moves of the players (each move is a tuple of choosen targets indexes)

set_players(defenders, attackers)[source]¶

run this method to add new players to the game

get_player_payoffs(player_index, moves)[source]¶

It returns the utility of a player given a dict of moves. Each move is a tuple of target indexes
